code: import React from"react";import'./Card.css';import{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Card=_ref=>{let{vegimage,vegname,price,location,isAltStyle,onAddToCart}=_ref;const[quantity,setQuantity]=useState(1);const handleAddToCart=()=>{const item={vegname,quantity,price};onAddToCart(item);console.log('onAddToCart in Card:',onAddToCart);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:isAltStyle?'card alt-style':'card',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:isAltStyle?'image alt-style':'image',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:vegimage})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:isAltStyle?'info alt-style':'info',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"info-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"veg_name",children:vegname}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"price",children:["\u20B9",price,"/kg"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"location",children:location}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Quantity :",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{value:quantity,onChange:e=>setQuantity(Number(e.target.value)),children:[1,2,3,4,5].map(kg=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("option",{value:kg,children:[kg," kg"]},kg))})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"atc",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleAddToCart,children:"+"})})]})]});};export default Card;
